articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
BearConf
- cheapest hostel in town is official lodging 
- happy meals for lunch 
- no venue we just get together, hack, and group at coffee shops 
- no parties, we all just go vibe at McDonald’s every night
- public goods focused
- keynote speaker is @notscottmoore 
Who’s down?

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
🔥 lit 🔥
Lit Protocol: 🔥 New Post 🔥
Learn how to encrypt data using @LitProtocol, upload it to @ArweaveTeam using @BundlrNetwork, then have another user who meets access control conditions fetch  and decrypt using Lit!
 https://blog.litprotocol.com/?p=lit-x-bundlr-x-arweave-guide
articles.title: 🔥 lit 🔥

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Jacob Creech ☀️🦀
Hey folks please help Solana and commit to the Solana StackExchange today
If we do not get more 200+ rep commits by June 26th, the proposal will be closed and there won't be an opportunity to try again
This is our last chance! https://area51.stackexchange.com/proposals/126615

Absolutely amazing work by the Warp team

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT GraphOps | graphops.eth
We're hiring TypeScript Engineers, Rust Engineers & Designers 🎉
Come join us:
The Graph: The Graph core devs continue to grow! 👩‍🚀
As just announced by @evabeylin at #GraphDay2022, a $12M grant has been awarded to @graphopsxyz, a longstanding contributor & Indexer, to provide core research & development in The Graph ecosystem! 🧵
articles.title: RT GraphOps | graphops.eth: We're hiring TypeScript Engineers, Rust Engineers & Designers 🎉 Come join us:
Full Stack Web3 with Lens Protocol, Next.js, and GraphQL - Building a Social Media App
